column1: I have used this product for a long time. I went without it for a couple of months and noticed how dry my skin was It is sold several places but when it is $40 cheaper you cannot go wrong

I'm a previous user of this product and I'm totally unsatisfied with this purchase. It is not the same product I've used fir years. The packaging is the same but the product is not.
